trans-unit.source: Allows you to override attributes applied to properties, fields, and classes when you use an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> to serialize or deserialize an object as encoded SOAP.
trans-unit.target: Permite reemplazar atributos aplicados a propiedades, campos y clases cuando se utiliza un objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> para serializar o deserializar un objeto como SOAP codificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class enables an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to override the default way of serializing a set of objects.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> clase habilita un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> para reemplazar el modo predeterminado de serialización de un conjunto de objetos.

trans-unit.source: Overriding serialization in this way has two uses: first, you can control and augment the serialization of objects found in a DLL, even if you do not have access to the source; second, you can create one set of serializable classes, but serialize the objects in multiple ways.
trans-unit.target: Reemplazar la serialización de este modo tiene dos usos: en primer lugar, puede controlar y aumentar la serialización de objetos que se encuentran en un archivo DLL, incluso si no tiene acceso al origen; en segundo lugar, puede crear un conjunto de clases serializables, pero serializar los objetos de varias maneras.

trans-unit.source: For example, instead of serializing members of a class instance as XML elements, you can serialize them as XML attributes, resulting in a more efficient document to transport.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, en lugar de serializar los miembros de una instancia de clase como elementos XML, puede serializar ellos como atributos XML, lo que causará un documento más eficaz para el transporte.

trans-unit.source: After you create a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>, you create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> class.
trans-unit.target: Después de crear un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>, se crea un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> mediante la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> método de la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> clase.

trans-unit.source: Pass the resulting object as an argument to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Pase el objeto resultante como argumento a la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%2A> constructor.

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> uses the data contained by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> to override attributes that control how objects are serialized.
trans-unit.target: Resultante <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> utiliza los datos contenidos en el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> para reemplazar los atributos que controlan cómo se serializan los objetos.

trans-unit.source: To accomplish this, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> contains a collection of the object types that are overridden, as well as a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> associated with each overridden object type.
trans-unit.target: Para lograr esto, la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> contiene una colección de los tipos de objeto que se reemplazan, así como un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> asociados a cada tipo de objeto reemplazado.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> contains an appropriate set of attribute objects that control how each field, property, or class is serialized.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> contiene un conjunto apropiado de objetos de atributos que controlan cómo se serializa cada campo, propiedad o clase.

trans-unit.source: The process for creating and using a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> is as follows:
trans-unit.target: El proceso para crear y usar un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> es como sigue:

trans-unit.source: Create a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>.
trans-unit.target: Creará un control <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>.

trans-unit.source: Create an attribute object that is appropriate to the object being overridden.
trans-unit.target: Crear un objeto de atributo que sea adecuado para el objeto que se va a invalidar.

trans-unit.source: For example, to override a field or property, create a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>, using the new, derived type.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, para reemplazar un campo o propiedad, cree un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>, utilizando el nuevo tipo derivado.

trans-unit.source: You can optionally assign a new <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute.ElementName%2A> that overrides the base class's attribute name or namespace.
trans-unit.target: Opcionalmente, puede asignar un nuevo <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute.ElementName%2A> que invalida el nombre del atributo o espacio de nombres de la clase base.

trans-unit.source: Add the attribute object to the appropriate <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> property or collection.
trans-unit.target: Agregue el objeto de atributo correspondientes <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> propiedad o la colección.

trans-unit.source: For example, you would set the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapElement%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> object to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> and specify the member name that is being overridden.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, se establecería el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapElement%2A> propiedad de la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> el objeto a la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> y especifique el nombre de miembro que se está reemplazando.

trans-unit.source: Create a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: Creará un control <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.

trans-unit.source: Add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Agregar el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> a la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> mediante el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides.Add%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: If the object being overridden is a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>, you need only specify the type of the overridden object.
trans-unit.target: Si el objeto que se está reemplazando es un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>, tan sólo necesita especificar el tipo del objeto reemplazado.

trans-unit.source: But if you are overriding a field or property, you must also specify the name of the overridden member.
trans-unit.target: Pero si va a reemplazar un campo o propiedad, también debe especificar el nombre del miembro reemplazado.

trans-unit.source: Create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> class.
trans-unit.target: Crear un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> mediante la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> método de la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> clase.

trans-unit.source: When constructing the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>, pass the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Al construir el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>, pasar la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> a la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%2A> constructor.

trans-unit.source: Use the resulting <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to serialize or deserialize the class objects.
trans-unit.target: Utilice el cuadro <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> para serializar o deserializar los objetos de clase.

trans-unit.source: The following example serializes a class named `Group`.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se serializa una clase denominada `Group`.

trans-unit.source: The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden.
trans-unit.target: La serialización de la `GroupName` y `IgnoreThis` campos y los miembros de la `GroupType` se reemplaza la enumeración.

trans-unit.source: In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> is created with the appropriate property set and added to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: En el `CreateOverrideSerializer` método, un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> está creada y cada miembro reemplazado o enumeración, un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> se crea con la correspondiente propiedad establecida y agregada a la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> is created using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>, and that <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> is used to create the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> that overrides the default serialization.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> se crea utilizando el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>y que <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> se utiliza para crear el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> que invalida la serialización predeterminada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example serializes a class named `Group`.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se serializa una clase denominada `Group`.

trans-unit.source: The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden.
trans-unit.target: La serialización de la `GroupName` y `IgnoreThis` campos y los miembros de la `GroupType` se reemplaza la enumeración.

trans-unit.source: In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> is created with the appropriate property set and added to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: En el `CreateOverrideSerializer` método, un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> está creada y cada miembro reemplazado o enumeración, un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> se crea con la correspondiente propiedad establecida y agregada a la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> is created using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>, and that <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> is used to create the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> that overrides the default serialization.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> se crea utilizando el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>y que <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> se utiliza para crear el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> que invalida la serialización predeterminada.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> to the collection of <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> objects contained by the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides" />.
trans-unit.target: Agrega un objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> a la colección de objetos <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> incluidos en <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the object that is overridden.
trans-unit.target: Tipo <see cref="T:System.Type" /> del objeto que se va a reemplazar.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> that represents the overriding attributes.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> que representa a los atributos de reemplazo.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> to a collection of <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Agrega un objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> a una colección de objetos <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="type" /> parameter specifies an object to be overridden by the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" />.
trans-unit.target: El parámetro <paramref name="type" /> especifica un objeto que va a ser reemplazado por el objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> contains a union of attribute objects that cause the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to override its default serialization behavior for a set of objects.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> contiene una unión de objetos de atributos que hacen que la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> invalidar su comportamiento de serialización predeterminado para un conjunto de objetos.

trans-unit.source: You choose the attribute objects to place in the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>, depending on the particular behaviors you want to override.
trans-unit.target: Elija los objetos de atributo para colocar en el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>, dependiendo de los comportamientos concretos que se desea invalidar.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes a class member as an XML element by default.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializa un miembro de clase como un elemento XML de forma predeterminada.

trans-unit.source: If you want the member to be serialized as an XML attribute instead, you would create a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>, assign it to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A> property of a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>, and add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: Si desea que el miembro se serializa como un atributo XML en su lugar, debe crear un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>, asígnelo a la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A> propiedad de un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>y agregue el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> a la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides.Add%2A> method to add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides.Add%2A> método para agregar el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> a la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to add a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> that contains a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Utilice esta sobrecarga para agregar un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> que contiene un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute> overrides the serialization of a class, you need not specify a member of the class to override, only the type of the class.
trans-unit.target: Dado que el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute> invalida la serialización de una clase, no es necesario especificar un miembro de la clase para reemplazar, sólo el tipo de la clase.

trans-unit.source: The following example serializes a class named `Group`.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se serializa una clase denominada `Group`.

trans-unit.source: The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden.
trans-unit.target: La serialización de la `GroupName` y `IgnoreThis` campos y los miembros de la `GroupType` se reemplaza la enumeración.

trans-unit.source: In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> is created with the appropriate property set and added to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: En el `CreateOverrideSerializer` método, un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> está creada y cada miembro reemplazado o enumeración, un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> se crea con la correspondiente propiedad establecida y agregada a la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> is created using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>, and that <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> is used to create the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> that overrides the default serialization.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> se crea utilizando el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>y que <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> se utiliza para crear el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> que invalida la serialización predeterminada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the object to override.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> del objeto que se va a reemplazar.

trans-unit.source: The name of the member to override.
trans-unit.target: Nombre del miembro que se va a reemplazar.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> that represents the overriding attributes.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> que representa a los atributos de reemplazo.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> to the collection of <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> objects contained by the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides" />.
trans-unit.target: Agrega un objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> a la colección de objetos <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> incluidos en <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="type" /> parameter specifies the object to be overridden by the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" />.
trans-unit.target: El parámetro <paramref name="type" /> especifica el objeto que va a ser reemplazado por <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="member" /> parameter specifies the name of a member that is overridden.
trans-unit.target: El parámetro <paramref name="member" /> especifica el nombre de un miembro que se va a reemplazar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> contains a union of attribute objects that cause the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to override its default serialization behavior for a set of objects.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> contiene una unión de objetos de atributos que hacen que la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> invalidar su comportamiento de serialización predeterminado para un conjunto de objetos.

trans-unit.source: You choose the attribute objects to place in the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>, depending on the particular behaviors you want to override.
trans-unit.target: Elija los objetos de atributo para colocar en el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>, dependiendo de los comportamientos concretos que se desea invalidar.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes a class member as an XML element by default.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializa un miembro de clase como un elemento XML de forma predeterminada.

trans-unit.source: If you want the member to be serialized as a SOAP attribute instead, you would create a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>, assign it to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A> property of a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>, and add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: Si desea que el miembro se serializa como un atributo SOAP en su lugar, debe crear un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>, asígnelo a la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A> propiedad de un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>y agregue el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> a la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides.Add%2A> method to add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides.Add%2A> método para agregar el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> a la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.

trans-unit.source: Use this method when the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> contains either a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute><xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>, or <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Utilice este método cuando el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> contiene un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute> <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>, o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute>.

trans-unit.source: The following example serializes a class named `Group`.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se serializa una clase denominada `Group`.

trans-unit.source: The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden.
trans-unit.target: La serialización de la `GroupName` y `IgnoreThis` campos y los miembros de la `GroupType` se reemplaza la enumeración.

trans-unit.source: In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> is created with the appropriate property set and added to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: En el `CreateOverrideSerializer` método, un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> está creada y cada miembro reemplazado o enumeración, un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> se crea con la correspondiente propiedad establecida y agregada a la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> is created using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>, and that <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> is used to create the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> that overrides the default serialization.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> se crea utilizando el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>y que <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> se utiliza para crear el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> que invalida la serialización predeterminada.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents the collection of overriding SOAP attributes.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un objeto que representa la colección de atributos SOAP de reemplazo.

trans-unit.source: The base class <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that is associated with the collection of attributes you want to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Tipo <see cref="T:System.Type" /> de la clase base que está asociado a la colección de atributos que se desea recuperar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object associated with the specified (base class) type.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el objeto asociado al tipo (de clase base) especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> that represents the collection of overriding attributes.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> que representa la colección de atributos de reemplazo.

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to return a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> that contains attributes for a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Utilice esta sobrecarga para devolver un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> que contiene los atributos de un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> that is used to override the serialization of an instance of the `Group` class.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se crea un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> que se utiliza para reemplazar la serialización de una instancia de la `Group` clase.

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides.Item%2A> property to retrieve the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> that is used to specify how the serialization is being overridden.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo también se utiliza la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides.Item%2A> propiedad que se va a recuperar el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> que se utiliza para especificar cómo se reemplaza la serialización.

trans-unit.source: The base class <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that is associated with the collection of attributes you want to override.
trans-unit.target: Tipo <see cref="T:System.Type" /> de la clase base que está asociado a la colección de atributos que se desea reemplazar.

trans-unit.source: The name of the overridden member that specifies the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> to return.
trans-unit.target: Nombre del miembro reemplazado que especifica el objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> que se va a devolver.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object associated with the specified (base class) type.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el objeto asociado al tipo (de clase base) especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="member" /> parameter specifies the base class member that is overridden.
trans-unit.target: El parámetro <paramref name="member" /> especifica el miembro de clase base que se reemplaza.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> that represents the collection of overriding attributes.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> que representa la colección de atributos de reemplazo.

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to return a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> that contains attributes that override a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute>, or <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Utilice esta sobrecarga para devolver un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> que contenga objetos que reemplacen un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute>, o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>.

trans-unit.source: You can also return a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> that contains the override of a default value that uses a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: También puede devolver un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> que contiene el reemplazo de un valor predeterminado que usa un <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> contains a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>, you must use the overload that specifies only the overridden type.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> contiene un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>, debe utilizar la sobrecarga que especifique sólo el tipo reemplazado.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> used to override the serialization of an instance of the `Group` class.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se crea un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> utiliza para reemplazar la serialización de una instancia de la `Group` clase.

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides.Item%2A> property to retrieve the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> that is used to specify how the serialization is being overridden.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo también se utiliza la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides.Item%2A> propiedad que se va a recuperar el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> que se utiliza para especificar cómo se reemplaza la serialización.
